attributes.action: make people who claim unemployment benefit work in the community for their payments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many people claim unemployment benefit in this country with no intention of finding work. These parasites are draining government resources and stealing from ALL tax payers. Make these individuals work and contribute to society by earning their keep.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
